about_the_game:
Patriotika RPG: Shadow World immerses you in the journey of Erin, who, with the blessings of the Goddess Athena, transforms into the formidable superheroine, Patriotika. This traditional turn-based RPG offers an expansive exploration of New Haven's diverse neighborhoods, coupled with thrilling "Shadow Hunts" where you'll face off against intricately designed villains.



Featuring new villains debuting for the first time, that will appear in future issues of the comics!

Embark on a heroic quest alongside iconic characters from Mount Olympus Comics. Team up with Gwen, the steadfast cop known from "Mad Wolf and Cop" and "Patriotika"; Zero G, the elusive ninja; Jimena, the fearless vampire hunter; among others. Each ally brings unique abilities and depth to your adventure through the shadow-laden streets of New Haven.



Key Features of Patriotika RPG: City of Shadows

  • Dynamic Leveling System: Progress through the game to level up, earn Skill Points (SP), and unlock a diverse array of powerful skills tailored to your playstyle.
  • Customizable Equipment: Immerse yourself in deep equipment customization (equip different chains for Jimena to learn skills, or use bullets to give elemental properties to Gwen's bullets) to tailor your hero's arsenal to your strategic preferences, enhancing your prowess in battles against the shadows.
  • Free Exploration: Venture through the vast neighborhoods of New Haven, each teeming with side-quests that unravel the city's secrets and deepen your engagement with its intriguing world.
  • Original Characters: Encounter beautifully crafted characters, each brought to life with stunning detail, contributing to a rich, visually captivating experience.
  • Illustration Gallery: Collect and admire a vast gallery of high-quality illustrations and comic scans, celebrating the artistry of Mount Olympus Comics and the visual narrative of your adventure.
  • Interactive City Life with Mini-Games: Engage in an array of mini-games that make New Haven's streets come alive, offering fun, interactive experiences beyond the main quest.
  • Recruit and Assist Companions: Gather a team of companions from the rich lore of Mount Olympus Comics. Embark on personal quests to assist them, forging deeper bonds and unlocking their full potential alongside Patriotika.
